item.title: Supreme Court won’t hear challenge to landmark gay marriage ruling
item.description: The announcement indicates there is not an appetite among the high court’s conservative majority to revisit one of the court’s most significant decisi...

item.title: Supreme Court to decide if mail-in ballots may arrive after Election Day
item.description: An appeals court found that federal law requires all ballots be received by Election Day.

item.title: Trump pardons Giuliani, other allies who sought to overturn 2020 election
item.description: None of the more than 75 people listed have been charged with federal crimes, though several have been prosecuted in states.

item.title: Trump administration wants Supreme Court to intervene in SNAP fight again
item.description: The battle over funding for the nation’s largest anti-hunger program has left millions wondering how they will afford food.

item.title: U.S. strikes two more alleged drug boats, pushing death toll past 75
item.description: The attacks in the eastern Pacific Ocean, disclosed Monday by Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth, killed six people, he said.
